summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal water system of The City of Seattle; adopting a system or plan of additions or betterments to or extensions of the existing municipal water system; authorizing the issuance and sale of water system revenue bonds, in one or more series, for the purposes of paying part of the cost of carrying out that system or plan, providing a bond reserve and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds; describing the lien of the bonds; and creating certain accounts of the City relating to those bonds.
